description:
Due to a mistake during the summoning process, 30-year-old social animal Liu Enuo is accidentally summoned into the game world. In order to return to reality as soon as possible, Liu Enuo starts to help the 18-year-old "brave" Tian Enya to save the world. With his excellent knowledge, Eno, who is already a high roller, is able to take advantage of the other world. Enya also grows from a capricious young girl to a mature and reliable older girl.
source: bgm.tv/DeepL.com

REGULAR.description:
It`s Liu Yinuo`s 30th birthday, and she`s still getting yelled at over the phone by her boss at her exploitative company. Tired of it all, she asks for a life-changing event and learns the hard way to be careful what you wish for!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 30-sai no Watashi ni Sekai o Sukueru?
30歳の私に世界を救える?
Can I Save the World at 30?
我三十岁了还能拯救世界吗?

REGULAR.description:
Yinuo and Enya learn about an unexpected past connection, and together they head to Forest City, where they find that they`re wanted criminals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare ni mo Barenakya Sennyuu Seikou
If Nobody Finds Out, I`m In
没人发现就算潜入成功
誰にもバレなきゃ潜入成功

REGULAR.description:
Yinuo and Enya are captured and put in an underground prison for later interrogation. There, they encounter two girls who look clearly different than the rest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Datsugoku! Chikarou kara Nigero
Prison Break! Escape the Underground Cells!
脱獄! 地下牢から逃げろ
越狱! 逃出地牢吧!

REGULAR.description:
Yinuo and Enya go visit Cherry again to learn more about the world. When they find out she used to be an adventurer, they try to recruit her, but she has a condition!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auto Mode! Keikenchi o Kasegasete
Auto Mode! Let Me Farm XP!
オートモード! 経験値を稼がせて
挂机! 让我刷经验

REGULAR.description:
With a new addition to the party, Yinuo and Enya now set their sights on recruiting Putao. Other ideas, however, she has.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Think I`m More Suited to Farmwork
Yappari Hatakeshigoto ga Atteru Watashi ni wa
やっぱり畑仕事があってる私には
看来还是种田适合我

REGULAR.description:
When running away from the Tomato Dragon, Yinuo and Enya stumble upon the summoning altar, where Enya gets to try her luck at calling her own summon beast. Unfortunately, not all is as it seems...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Be Responsible When Rolling Gacha
Gacha wa Hodohodo ni
ガチャはほどほどに
抽卡别上头, 差不多得了

REGULAR.description:
Faced with the Demons of Song and Knowledge, Enya and Yinuo have to find a way to survive! Meanwhile, Jinjin from the item shop appears before Cherry and Putao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How Do You Like the Music?
Ongaku wa Ikaga?
您, 要来点音乐吗?
音楽はいかが?

REGULAR.description:
Enya is baffled by Yinuo`s utter lack of faith in her and vows to make her respect her. To do that, she has to level by going back to the basics: clearing the beginner quests!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A! Shokyuu Quest o Yaranakya
Oh! Better Clear the Beginner Quest
あ! 初級クエストをやらなきゃ
啊! 该回去清初级任务了

REGULAR.description:
The Forest City Fighting Tournament kicks off with some heated battles, and some that aren’t.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Budou Taikai Kaishi! Stage Clear ni Sonae yo
Fighting Tournament Begins! Prepare for Stage Clear
武道大会開始! ステージクリアに備えよ
竞技赛开始! 做好通关准备!

REGULAR.description:
Enya`s fight with Nagu literally puts everyone to sleep but ends with unexpected results.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore ga Kyuuseishu no Tatakai Kata
This Is How the Messiah Fights
これが救世主の戦い方
这就是救世主的战斗方式!

REGULAR.description:
Enya is captured by a sudden invader. With her life in danger, her invincible Sensei sets out to rescue her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Emergency Quest: Save Enya!
Kinkyuu Quest.. Enya o Sukue!
紧急任务 - 救回恩雅!
緊急クエスト――エンヤァを救え!

REGULAR.description:
With the Forest City under attack and Yinuo out of the picture, the party and their merry friends must work together to defend their home! Meanwhile, Enya faces an impossible challenge to save Yinuo...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Chapter: Save Noa
Saishuushou: Noa o Sukuu
最終章 ノアを救う
最终章 - 拯救诺雅!
Zanting! Rang Wo Cha Gonglue
Let Me Check the Walkthrough First
攻略うぉんてっど! 異世界救います!?
暂停！让我查攻略
Kouryaku Wanted! Isekai Sukuimasu!?
Pause! Let Me Check the Walkthrough First
Zanting! Rang Wo Cha Gonglüe
